name: Proctris
description:
Proctris - a procedural stacking puzzle game inspired by Tetris.

Controls:
START - Enter
PAUSE - P
MOVE PIECES - WASD + Arrow buttons
ROTATE - Arrow up / W

Objective:
The game has 10 levels with increasingly faster speed. Clearing more lines at once yields higher score. 

User registration:
Any mail will do to register, email confirmation not needed, and password reset not available. Can also post scores as guest at the end of the game, if you want.  User registration is limited to this game only and serves only the single purpose of having a unique username to display with your score on the scoreboard.
